text: Ceroplesis thunbergii is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Fahraeus in 1872. It is known from Kenya and Tanzania.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis thunbergii. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1872
title: Ceroplesis thunbergii
